exerciseDesc: It helps to think of/identify someone with who you can share your feelings, at least to some extent.

In addition, there is a wide range of social activities which may reduce your sense of isolation and improve your overall support system, even if you do not share very personal matters in these contexts.
Please check the following list and select any social activity that you may be able to and want to engage in/carry out more often.
feedback: Please remember that these are only a few examples to start your thinking process along these lines.

questions.questionContent: Playing a game with a friend
Doing yoga/going for a walk/swimming with someone who shares that interest
Joining a hobby class and making new connections
Teaching a child in your neighborhood
